description: Installation of a memorial comprising an artistic mural.
decision_conditions:
CONDITION:  The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans:

Cover letter, Email correspondence dated 22/06/2010, Islington Gazette article 12/12/2007, Presentation to the redbrick Tmo Meeting 14/01/10, FT/EC1/P001, P01, P02, P-04-04-049 REV A (LBI Reg 13641)

The development shall be carried out strictly in accordance with the details so approved, shall be maintained as such thereafter and no change therefrom shall take place without the prior written consent of the Local Planning Authority.

REASON: To comply with Section 70(1) (a) of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 as amended and the Reason for Grant and also for the avoidance of doubt and in the interest of proper planning.
